summary: This bill, the International Quantum Research Exchange Act, mandates the Secretary of State to establish a program promoting international collaboration in quantum information science. The program will provide grants to institutions of higher education and support scientist exchange programs. The Secretary must coordinate with relevant government agencies and align the program with national strategies, prioritizing research security and collaboration with countries that have signed quantum cooperation agreements. Annual reports to Congress are required, and $20 million is authorized for fiscal year 2026, with a sunset provision after 10 years.
